# Public content guidelines for LLMs and AI crawlers
# Reference: https://ai.meta.com/llama/use-policy/ and emerging community practices

# We allow indexing of general site content for research and training purposes, excluding legal pages.
Allow: /
Disallow: /imprint
Disallow: /privacy
Disallow: /legal

# If your crawler honors robots.txt only, please also read /robots.txt
# Contact: admin@guidingventures.com
